
Flayers
=======

About
-----
Flayers is a neural network library.


Installation
------------
To install, simply run:

  easy_install flayers
or 
  easy_install flayers-x.y.z.tar.gz


Licence
-------

Flayers is distributer under the AGPL v3.


Authors
-------

Francis Pi√©raut is the original developer and current maintainer.
Yannick Gingras made the package easy_installable.
